Description.Text: Location The beach hotel is situated on a paradise private island, in 'Tierra Bomba', just 10 minutes from Cartagena by sea. Facilities Travellers can feel at home in one of the 55 rooms. Amenities include a cloakroom. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Various gastronomic options are available, including a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room and a bar. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features at the establishment include a newspaper stand, a TV room and a playroom. Bicycles can be left in the bicycle storage area. Facilities include room service. Rooms The accommodation features rooms with air conditioning and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony with a view for guests' enjoyment. Travellers can enjoy a good nights' sleep on the double bed. There is also a minibar. Guests will also find a mini fridge included as standard. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and WiFi. Rooms suitable for wheelchair access are bookable. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. Sun loungers and parasols are ideal for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Beach volleyball, volleyball and archery are available to active guests. Water sports enthusiasts are offered windsurfing. Sport and leisure facilities at the hotel include table tennis, billiards and aerobics. Guests of all ages have the opportunity to enjoy an interesting entertainment programme. Meals Catering options available at the establishment include half board, full board and all-inclusive. Snacks and meals, including breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Staff are also happy to provide special dietary cuisine. The accommodation also offers special catering options. Drinks are included in the price for travellers. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard.
